dcterms:description: A benchmark dataset for measuring the degree of semantic equivalence between two sentences, commonly used in semantic textual similarity tasks.
dcterms:title: SemEval 2012 STS Dataset

dcterms:creator: Eneko Agirre
Aitor Gonzalez-Agirre
Inigo Lopez-Gazpio
Montse Maritxalar
German Rigau
Larraitz Uria
dcterms:description: A dataset for interpretable semantic textual similarity, consisting of sentence pairs from two domains: News Headlines and Flickr Images, annotated with alignments between chunks.
dcterms:title: SemEval 2016 iSTS Dataset
